FuncDef: This command configures the length for the local L2TPv3 nonce (random number) value used in the Nonce AVP.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the length of the Nonce AVP value. Values-16 to 64.
When specified within the config>service>vprn>l2tp>group>l2tpv3 context, this is referencing to the nonce-length configuration within the config>service>vprn>l2tp>l2tpv3 context.
